item.title: First Log
item.description: I have finally structured this website properly after one failed attempt and now I have come to my first log.
item.content:encoded:
I have finally structured this website properly after one failed attempt and now I have come to my first log.

I fully intend to add more structure to these posts over time, but I wanted to start from the simplest point possible for now.

Today I worked extensively on my Opening Thoughts document to capture my starting point and my initial intentions.
